string-array.name: arr_sedentary_reminder
string-array.item: Drink some water and take a walk.

string-array.name: stand_guide_page_content1
string-array.item: "Sitting down doesn't benefit your health. Even if you can't reduce the time you spend sitting, standing up every once in a while is a good idea."
This feature will remind you to spend at least 1 minute of every hour standing up. 12 hours with stand-up breaks every day will help you avoid the risks of a sedentary lifestyle.
Tap \"Continue\" to learn more and turn this feature on.

string-array.name: stand_guide_page_content2
string-array.item: Xiaomi Health can detect and record when you stand up. You can also receive reminders to stand up after 1 hour of inactivity.
This feature tracks your movement and sends reminders based on the results.
